ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It is a seminar wherein you will be stimulated to think critically about good and evil from many different angles. Classroom discourse will be engaging and worthwhile. It is a wonderful class. Everyone should be required to learn about their capacity for good and evil to better understand themselves and society.
I would recommend the class to another student, but only if they were willing to fight to participate. For those of us who were a little less loud, it was hard to get a word in edge wise.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It deepened my knowledge by showing me what work has been done in the field. This will guide my future research. It contributed to my research by making me more excited about the material and developing in me a more mature understanding of the important questions to ask.
